title: Ectasy Psychic Girl MIKO -Love of the Dead-
overview: R-15 Cut of Lesbian Ghost Yoko, a female novelist, is frightened by the shadows of ghosts that appear nightly. Through an introduction by an editor she knows, Yoko requests a medium, Miko. When Miko is shown around the house, she senses the presence of a strong 'feeling' that stays in this place. According to Yoko, it is probably her former lover, Luna
